def_en: When a baby or baby animal is weaned, its mother stops feeding it milk and starts giving it other food, especially solid food.

def_cn: 使放弃，使戒掉，使不再依赖(尤指恶习)
def_en: If you wean someone off a habit or something they like, you gradually make them stop doing it or liking it, especially when you think is bad for them.
